input.sentences: all dressed up for this year 's halloween party .
i love how my friends got into the spirit of wearing costumes . like my friend dressing as static cling .
we all had a great time .
output.sentences: Halloween is a great time to throw a party, especially a costume party, no telling who might show up!
We had a wide variety of characters the other night.
A lot of the party goers drank and talked most of the night.
Some of the partiers decided to hit the dance floor and bust a move!
All in all, it was a great night with great friends.
